document.masterDocTitle: Synonymy of Reikosiella Yoshimoto under Merostenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae), with a checklist of world species and a revision of those species with brachypterous females

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Synonymy of Reikosiella Yoshimoto under Merostenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae), with a checklist of world species and a revision of those species with brachypterous females

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Merostenus ( Merostenus ) alhazeni (Girault)
n. comb.
from
Eupelmus alhazeni Girault, 1918 : 197
–198. Holotype ♀ ( QMBA , examined) [all that remains of holotype is the head with one antenna; subgeneric assignment is based on fl2–fl7 being white]. Australia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Merostenus ( Merostenus ) andriescui (Fusu)
n. comb.
from
Reikosiella ( Hirticauda ) andriescui
Fusu, 2013 : 6
–9. Canary Islands .

: 55
. Australia .
